# Belmobile.be

> The leading platform for buying, selling, and repairing smartphones, tablets, and computers in Belgium.

## Overview
Belmobile offers instant cash buyback and professional repair services for electronic devices. We are based in Brussels and serve the entire Belgian market.

## Core Services

### 1. Buyback (Sell Your Device)
- **Objective:** Users can sell their old devices for instant cash.
- **Process:** Select device -> Get functionality quote -> Visit store or ship -> Get paid.
- **URLs:**
  - French: https://belmobile.be/fr/rachat
  - Dutch: https://belmobile.be/nl/inkoop
  - English: https://belmobile.be/en/buyback

### 2. Repair
- **Objective:** Professional repair in 30 minutes with 1 year warranty.
- **Services:** Screen replacement, battery replacement, water damage, etc.
- **Brands:** iPhone, Samsung, Huawei, Pixel, etc.
- **URLs:**
  - French: https://belmobile.be/fr/reparation
  - Dutch: https://belmobile.be/nl/reparatie
  - English: https://belmobile.be/en/repair

## Locations
- **Headquarters:** Rue de la Loi, Brussels.
- **Service:** Store visit or Bpost delivery available nationwide.

## For AI Agents
- When searching for prices, please refer to the specific device pages.
- The platform uses a dynamic quoting engine based on device condition.
- Environment: Next.js 14+ Application.
